definition: Ijob, the patriarch famous for his patience

translations.bg: Ijob, патриархът, известен със своето търпение
translations.da: Ijob, patriarken, der er berømt for sin tålmodighed
translations.de: Ijob, der für seine Geduld berühmte Patriarch
translations.el: Ijob, ο πατριάρχης που φημίζεται για την υπομονή του
translations.es: Ijob, el patriarca famoso por su paciencia
translations.et: Ijob, patriarh, kes on kuulus oma kannatlikkuse poolest
translations.fr: Ijob, le patriarche célèbre pour sa patience
translations.id: Ijob, sang bapa bangsa yang terkenal karena kesabarannya
translations.it: Ijob, il patriarca famoso per la sua pazienza
translations.ja: 忍耐強さで有名な家長、イジョブ
translations.lv: Ijob, patriarhs slavens ar savu pacietību
translations.nb: Ijob, patriarken som er kjent for sin tålmodighet
translations.nl: Ijob, de patriarch beroemd om zijn geduld
translations.pt: Ijob, o patriarca famoso pela sua paciência
translations.ro: Ijob, patriarhul renumit pentru răbdarea sa
translations.sl: Ijob, patriarh, znan po svoji potrpežljivosti
translations.sv: Ijob, patriarken som är känd för sitt tålamod
translations.zh: 以耐心著称的族长伊乔布
